name: posts-per-page
help: This is the number of posts to display per page.

name: posts-direction
help: This is layout direction to use for the posts view.

name: messages-per-page
help: This is the number of messages to display per page.

name: default-privacy
help: This is default privacy setting to use when creating new posts.

name: show-items
help: This determines if post comments are initially shown or hidden.
